description: Combining their tap into the natural world with their raw power, Syphons have reversed the flow of arcana. Syphons tap into their enviroment, leeching it of its arcane energies, and consuming its form. Syphon spells take the physical world and strongly alter it, manipulating their enviroment to their advantage while taking its arcane energy for themselves. Syphons are typically feared by others as well, as they tend to be able to consume the power of their own kind, if given the chance.

spells.name: Arcane Sickness
spells.description: One of the limiting factors of Syphons is the impurity of unnatural arcana. Using Syphon spells causes the caster to roll an Abuse skill check, otherwise they become sickened by their arcane sources and must spend the next minute, or 12 rounds recovering. The difficulty for this check is 5, but investing in Arcane Sickness will naturally give the Syphon 1 success per investment for every check.

spells.name: Consume Arcana
spells.description: Requires contact with an enemy containing AP. Steals all AP and gives it back to the caster.

spells.name: Drink Flames
spells.description: Turns flame into AP, converting every square meter into 1 AP.

spells.name: Crunch Arcane Ice
spells.description: The caster takes half the AP needed to create an Arcane Ice structure, resulting in the structure melting immediately.

spells.name: Soak Damage
spells.description: Converts damage currently being taken into arcana, with 1 AP recieved per durability lost.

spells.name: Consume Sanity
spells.description: Steals arcana from the casters mind itself, resulting in an Insanity Check.

spells.name: Vomit
spells.description: Should the caster gain a sickness from their spells, they half the time spent recovering. Additionally the caster may expel any AP from themselves that they wish.

spells.name: Overdrive
spells.description: Allows the caster to purposefully induce an Overcharged state upon taking more AP then they can hold in their AB. They remain in this Overcharged for 1 round for every AP over their AB.
